title: Blush
description:
Kerri Kenney-Silver, Michael Martin, Jolenta Greenberg, Omri Navot and Sam Mullins share tales of embarrassments, large and small.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Megatroid, Donora, M83, Michael Martin, Alberta Cross, Jolenta Greenberg, Kerri Kenney-Silver, Omri Navot, Kevin Allison, Sam Mullins)
